arts.ttl: ‘I suppose…’: Portsmouth boss’ responds to Bristol City selection criticism as freshened side bury Swansea City
arts.sum: John Mousinho believes his side showed the energy to justify his criticised Bristol City selection shout as Pompey registered their biggest Championship win in 15 years.
Paddy Lane and Ryley Towler netted their first goals of the season as Portsmouth continued their excellent home form by running riot with a 4-0 victory over Swansea.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth begin 2025 with a bang was Swansea are battered by dominant Blues
arts.sum: Pompey began 2025 with a bang as they ran out comfortable winners against Swansea on New Year’s Day.

arts.ttl: ‘A man possessed’, ‘energiser’, ‘Swansea’s tormentor’: Jordan Cross’ Portsmouth ratings from Swansea City super show
arts.sum: The ratings are in from Pompey’s New Year’s Day clash with Swansea City.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth score four at Fratton Park again as Swansea suffer on south coast
arts.sum: Pompey backed up a 4-1 win over Coventry by thrashing the Swans on New Year’s Day.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth fans all say same thing following publication of team to face Swansea
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been reacting to John Mousinho’s starting XI for today’s visit of Swansea.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth ring changes for start of 2025 against Swansea City
arts.sum: Callum Lang returns amid four Pompey changes for Swansea City.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth relegation rivals make statement signing on day one of January transfer window - in position Blues are desperate to strengthen
arts.sum: Pompey relegation rivals QPR have moved quickly in the January transfer window to bolster their Championship survival chances.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth transfer news: John Mousinho's answers to eight key issues as January window opens for business
arts.sum: The January transfer window has finally arrived, leaving every Pompey fan and their dog anxiously waiting to see what the Blues will deliver during this important juncture in the season.

arts.ttl: Is Portsmouth v Swansea City on TV? Kick-off time and how to watch Championship fixture
arts.sum: All you need to know about Pompey’s first EFL Championship game of 2025.
